description:
Fix the Internet link association for the multiple user scenario.

BUG=29399
TBR=huanr
TEST=Install Chrome/Chromium at user level for more than one user on the same machine, set it as default for both users and make sure Start-Internet link launches correct browser.

Committed: http://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=35250
subject: Fix the Internet link association for the multiple user scenario.
